note: Freelance journalist & writer (&more). Topics: democracy, politics conflict, dissatisfaction, (dis)info, migration, science. AD. Radboud University.

fields.name: Arthur Schopenhauer
fields.value: 'Wer also nicht die Einsamkeit liebt, der liebt auch nicht die freiheit'

fields.name: Works on (among others)
fields.value: A dystopian philosopical novel & a documentary about democracy in Lebanon, shot during the may 2022 elections
